meanings.definition: The plural form of cerebellum, the part of the brain that plays a role in motor control.
meanings.sent1: The cerebella help with moving our bodies smoothly.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study the cerebella to understand how we balance.
meanings.sent3: The cerebella had a dance-off to see who could control the body better.
meanings.sent4: Her cerebella were like skilled conductors, orchestrating every movement.
meanings.sent5: The cerebella are like tiny directors guiding our physical actions.

meanings.definition: A plural noun referring to multiple cerebellums.
meanings.sent1: The cerebella in the lab were used for research.
meanings.sent2: She counted the cerebella in the brain models.
meanings.sent3: The cerebella gathered for a group meeting to discuss coordination.
meanings.sent4: In the brain, the cerebella work together like a team of experts.
meanings.sent5: The cerebella were like a group of friends, always supporting each other.
